---
id: create-a-promotion-job
title: "Create a Promotion Job"
description: "Use this endpoint to create an asynchronous job to generate codes and export promotion codes."
sidebar_label: "Create a Promotion Job"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "post api-method"
info_path: docs/api/promotions/promotions-standard-introduction
custom_edit_url: null
---

import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";
import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import SecuritySchemes from "@theme/ApiExplorer/SecuritySchemes";
import MimeTabs from "@theme/MimeTabs";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import ResponseSamples from "@theme/ResponseSamples";
import SchemaItem from "@theme/SchemaItem";
import SchemaTabs from "@theme/SchemaTabs";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create a Promotion Job"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v2/promotions/{promotionID}/jobs"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Use this endpoint to create an asynchronous job to generate codes and export promotion codes.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<details
  style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}}
  className={"openapi-markdown__details"}
  data-collapsed={false}
  open={true}
>
  <summary
    style={{}}
  >
    <h3
      className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}
    >
      Path Parameters
    </h3>
  </summary><div>
    <ul>
      <ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{"name":"promotionID","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"The unique identifier of a promotion."}}
      >
        
      </ParamsItem>
    </ul>
  </div>
</details><details
  style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}}
  className={"openapi-markdown__details"}
  data-collapsed={false}
  open={true}
>
  <summary
    style={{}}
  >
    <h3
      className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}
    >
      Header Parameters
    </h3>
  </summary><div>
    <ul>
      <ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{"name":"Authorization","in":"header","description":"The Bearer token required to get access to the API.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"Bearer"}}}
      >
        
      </ParamsItem>
    </ul>
  </div>
</details><MimeTabs
  className={"openapi-tabs__mime"}
>
  <TabItem
    label={"application/json"}
    value={"application/json-schema"}
  >
    <details
      style={{}}
      className={"openapi-markdown__details mime"}
      data-collapsed={false}
      open={true}
    >
      <summary
        style={{}}
        className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-mime"}
      >
        <h3
          className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-body"}
        >
          Body
        </h3><strong
          className={"openapi-schema__required"}
        >
          required
        </strong>
      </summary><div
        style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}
      >
        
      </div><ul
        style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}
      >
        <SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"type"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"description":"Must be set to `promotion_job`.","type":"string","example":"promotion_job"}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"job_type"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`code_generate`, `code_export`]"}
          schema={{"description":"Specifies the type of task you want to run. For example, `code_generate` to generate codes or `code_export` to export codes.","type":"string","enum":["code_generate","code_export"]}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"name"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** `<= 50 characters`"}
          schema={{"type":"string","description":"Represents the name of the job. The maximum allowed length is 50.","maxLength":50}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={true}
          className={"schemaItem"}
        >
          <details
            style={{}}
            className={"openapi-markdown__details"}
          >
            <summary
              style={{}}
            >
              <span
                className={"openapi-schema__container"}
              >
                <strong
                  className={"openapi-schema__property"}
                >
                  parameters
                </strong><span
                  className={"openapi-schema__name"}
                >
                   object
                </span>
              </span>
            </summary><div
              style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}
            >
              <SchemaItem
                collapsible={false}
                name={"number_of_codes"}
                required={false}
                schemaName={"integer"}
                qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** `<= 1000`"}
                schema={{"type":"integer","description":"Specifies the number of codes to be generated. It cannot be greater than the maximum number of codes per promotion, which defaults at 1000.","maximum":1000}}
              >
                
              </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                collapsible={false}
                name={"max_uses_per_code"}
                required={false}
                schemaName={"integer"}
                qualifierMessage={undefined}
                schema={{"type":"integer","description":"Specifies the maximum number of usages of a code. If set to zero, you cannot use this promotion. If no value is set, it can be used unlimited times."}}
              >
                
              </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                collapsible={false}
                name={"consume_unit"}
                required={false}
                schemaName={"string"}
                qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`per_item`, `per_cart`]"}
                schema={{"type":"string","description":"Specifies whether the usage limitation is at the item-level or cart-level.","enum":["per_item","per_cart"]}}
              >
                
              </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                collapsible={false}
                name={"code_prefix"}
                required={false}
                schemaName={"string"}
                qualifierMessage={undefined}
                schema={{"type":"string","description":"Indicates the prefix to include with the promotion code. For example, when the generated value is *aa2b-3c4d* and the prefix value is set as *summer*, the promotion code becomes *summer-aa2b-3c4d*."}}
              >
                
              </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                collapsible={false}
                name={"code_length"}
                required={false}
                schemaName={"integer"}
                qualifierMessage={undefined}
                schema={{"type":"integer","description":"Specifies the code length, which ranges from 8 to 16 characters. The default code length is eight characters, and a dash is added after every four characters in the code. For example, *aa2b-3c4d*."}}
              >
                
              </SchemaItem>
            </div>
          </details>
        </SchemaItem>
      </ul>
    </details>
  </TabItem>
</MimeTabs><div>

          Promotion job created

                          >
                            <SchemaItem
                              collapsible={false}
                              name={"id"}
                              required={false}
                              schemaName={"string"}
                              qualifierMessage={undefined}
                              schema={{"type":"string","description":"A unique ID generated when a job is created."}}
                            >
                              
                            </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                              collapsible={false}
                              name={"type"}
                              required={false}
                              schemaName={"string"}
                              qualifierMessage={undefined}
                              schema={{"description":"Always `promotion_job`.","type":"string","example":"promotion_job"}}
                            >
                              
                            </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                              collapsible={false}
                              name={"promotion_id"}
                              required={false}
                              schemaName={"string"}
                              qualifierMessage={undefined}
                              schema={{"description":"A unique ID of a promotion.","type":"string"}}
                            >
                              
                            </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                              collapsible={false}
                              name={"job_type"}
                              required={false}
                              schemaName={"string"}
                              qualifierMessage={undefined}
                              schema={{"description":"The type of job you want to run. For example, `code_generate` to generate codes or `code_export` to export codes.","type":"string"}}
                            >
                              
                            </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                              collapsible={false}
                              name={"name"}
                              required={false}
                              schemaName={"string"}
                              qualifierMessage={undefined}
                              schema={{"description":"The name of the job. The maximum length allowed is 50 characters.","type":"string"}}
                            >
                              
                            </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                              collapsible={false}
                              name={"parameters"}
                              required={false}
                              schemaName={"object"}
                              qualifierMessage={undefined}
                              schema={{"type":"object"}}
                            >
                              
                            </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                              collapsible={false}
                              name={"status"}
                              required={false}
                              schemaName={"string"}
                              qualifierMessage={undefined}
                              schema={{"description":"The status of the job. See [Overview](/docs/api/promotions/promotion-jobs).","type":"string"}}
                            >
                              
                            </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                              collapsible={true}
                              className={"schemaItem"}

                                    </span>

                                          collapsible={false}

                                          required={false}
                                          schemaName={"date-time"}
                                          qualifierMessage={undefined}
                                          schema={{"description":"The creation date of the job.","type":"string","format":"date-time"}}
                                        >
                                          
                                        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                                          collapsible={false}
                                          name={"updated_at"}
                                          required={false}
                                          schemaName={"date-time"}
                                          qualifierMessage={undefined}
                                          schema={{"description":"The last updated date of the job.","type":"string","format":"date-time"}}
                                        >
                                          
                                        </SchemaItem>
                                      </div>
                                    </details>
                                  </SchemaItem>
                                </div>
                              </details>
                            </SchemaItem>
                          </div>
